title: One UI 4.1 update goes live for the Galaxy A52 4G and Galaxy M62
content:
After seeding the One UI 4.1 update to the Galaxy A52s 5G, Galaxy A71 5G, and Galaxy S20 FE 4G last week, Samsung is now bringing the latest version of its custom skin to two more phones. The Galaxy A52 4G and Galaxy M62 are the latest Samsung phones to get the stable One UI

The post One UI 4.1 update goes live for the Galaxy A52 4G and Galaxy M62 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Galaxy A52 4G and Galaxy M62 are the latest Samsung phones to get the stable One UI 4.1 update. Read on.
